content.description: Source: Adapted from B. R. Mitchell, ed., European Historical Statistics, Palgrave Macmillan, London, 1975, p. 399.
content.question: Which of the following developments most directly facilitated the overall changes shown on the graph?

choices.label: The implementation of laissez-faire economic policies

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
